Evocation 1

Astral Projection
Ritual
S1
spell id [id]: 502
effect number [effect_number]: 85
damage [damage]: 37
spec [spec]: 8388608
range [provrange]: 7 provinces
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 2S
Remote Enchant Province - Gem Duration:37 ?
Hidden Enchantment :1
Cannot be cast by mindless:1
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
The caster's mind is separated from his body and travels the Astral Planes in search of military information. His mind and body are connected with a silvery cord, which can be detected by unfriendly Astral mages. Once detected, the cord of the mage can be severed - a traumatic experience indeed. Each casting of this ritual allows the mage to scry on one province. The use of extra astral pearls increases the duration of the ritual.
Duration: 1 month + 1 / extra astral pearl. Astral cord detection chance = 40% * enemy mage's astral level.
